    function getFemOverrideFromURLParams() {
        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        return urlParams.get('fem_override');
    }

    var modern_script_elem, ytAdTargetingLoadEvent, script_onload
    window.ytVideoAdTargetingConfig = window.ytVideoAdTargetingConfig || {}
    if (typeof (Event) === 'function') {
        ytAdTargetingLoadEvent = new Event('yt_ad_targeting_load_event');
    } else {
        ytAdTargetingLoadEvent = document.createEvent('Event');
        ytAdTargetingLoadEvent.initEvent('yt_ad_targeting_load_event', false, false);
    }

    script_onload = function () {
        window.page = FrontEndModules.initPage(JSON.parse(document.getElementById('page-data').innerHTML));
        // get Video AdTargeting Config  and then dispatch `ias_data_load_event`
        FrontEndModules.getAdTargetingConfig(JSON.parse(document.getElementById('page-data').innerHTML))
        .then((result) => {
            window.ytVideoAdTargetingConfig = result;

            if (window.ytVideoAdTargetingConfig.adTargetingParamsWithIas) {
                window.ytVideoAdTargetingConfig.adTargetingParams += encodeURIComponent('&cheetah=y'); // we need this extra flag for cheetah
                window.ytVideoAdTargetingConfig.adTargetingParamsWithIas += encodeURIComponent('&cheetah=y'); // we need this extra flag for cheetah
            }
            window.dispatchEvent(ytAdTargetingLoadEvent);
        }).catch((error) => {
            console.error(error);
        });
    }

    var locSrc = 'https://fem.gprod.postmedia.digital/v112.0/'; 

    // Check if fem_override is specified in the URL
    var femOverrideFromURLParams = getFemOverrideFromURLParams();

    if (femOverrideFromURLParams) {
        // If fem_override is found, store it in sessionStorage
        sessionStorage.setItem('femOverride', locSrc);
    } else {
        // Check if a version is stored in sessionStorage
        var sessionLocSrc = sessionStorage.getItem('femOverride');
        if (sessionLocSrc) {
            locSrc = sessionLocSrc;
        }
    }

    modern_script_elem = document.createElement('script')
    modern_script_elem.async = true
    modern_script_elem.type = "module"
